A few had days passed since Akane's Jinriki came\nback.%K%P
And our relationship was moving along quite\nnicely.%K%P
And a couple of other things had changed, too.%K%P
Akane had started to become really clingy, and\nwhenever she had a spare moment, she'd pop into\nmy room.%K%P
'Hey!'%K%P
'You really stick to me like glue.'%K%P
'This way I can feel you with my whole body. You\ndon't mind, do you?'%K%P
'I guess not.'%K%P
As Akane squeezed in closer reading a manga, her\nwhole body quivered like it tickled.%K%P
'What are you reading?'%K%P
'It's a romance manga I borrowed from Maika. I\nthought it might help.'%K%P
I sneaked a look at it as she read intently. The\nmain character and heroine were on a date.%K%P
'Hmm.'%K%P
A date...%K%P
You know, we haven't gone out, just the two of\nus, since we started dating.%K%P
'Hey, Akane. Why don't we go on a date?'%K%P
Akane looked up at me in shock.%K%P
'A date?! Let's go, let's go!'%K%P
Akane's eyes gleamed with excitement and I was\nglad I'd asked.%K%P
'Is there somewhere in particular you'd like to\ngo?'%K%P
'Somewhere to go... Hmmm...'%K%P
She put down the manga and folded her arms in\nthought.%K%P
It was a spur-of-the-moment question, but she\nwas so serious...%K%P
'We don't have to decide right now. We can think\nabout it later.'%K%P
'...Oh, I know! Let's go to the shopping\nstreet!'%K%P
'Huh? Don't you want to go someplace more\nspecial? It is a date, after all.'%K%P
'No, I want our first date to be here in town!'%K%P
'Is that bad?'%K%P
Akane cocked her head and looked at me with\nupturned eyes.%K%P
There was only one possible answer.%K%P
'Of course not. Actually, there are shops and\nplaces I'd like to take you to.'%K%P
'Yay! So, is it set?'%K%P
'Yeah, of course it is!'%K%P
'All right, a shopping street date it is! Can we\ngo right now?'%K%P
'Sorry, today I've got to help Maika after\nlunch. Let's go out tomorrow.'%K%P
'Aw, too bad. I guess if you promised to help,\nthen you can't avoid it.'%K%P
Akane looked disappointed, but she didn't\ncomplain, and brightened up right away.%K%P
'It's definitely on for tomorrow, right? I'm so\nexcited!'%K%P
'Me too.'%K%P
My face began to relax as I thought about it.%K%P
Tomorrow I'd have to be the perfect escort.%K%P
